fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stab two people at night.
- Recruit other SKs that aren't in the Serial Killer faction.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection immune.
- Can spawn even without non-Serial Killer faction SKs in the game.
- Recruiting players will turn them into a member of the Serial Killers. They keep their original abilities and attributes, but can see the factional chat.
